EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Personalization Content View Attribution Data Lake Object

Use these object name, API name, category, and field values when creating the Personalization Content View Attribution data lake object.

Object Parameters
Object Label: PersonalizationContentViewAttri
Object API Name: PersonalizationContentViewAttri__dll
Category: Engagement
Fields

Add these fields after the object’s standard fields.

FIELD LABEL	FIELD API NAME	DATA TYPE	PRIMARY KEY	EVENT TIME
Personalization Attribution Primary Key	PersonalizationAttrPk	Text	TRUE	FALSE
Attribution Date	AttributionDate	DateTime	FALSE	TRUE
Data Space	DataSpace	Text	FALSE	FALSE
Personalization Point	PersonalizationPoint	Text	FALSE	FALSE
Personalization Decision	PersonalizationDecision	Text	FALSE	FALSE
Personalizer	Personalizer	Text	FALSE	FALSE
DMO Record ID	DmoRecordId	Text	FALSE	FALSE
Unique Profile Count	UniqueProfileCount	Number	FALSE	FALSE
Personalization Request Count	PersonalizationRequestCount	Number	FALSE	FALSE
Attributed Clicks	AttributedClicks	Number	FALSE	FALSE
Attributed Orders	AttributedOrders	Number	FALSE	FALSE
Attributed Carts	AttributedCarts	Number	FALSE	FALSE
Attributed Views	AttributedViews	Number	FALSE	FALSE
Attributed Revenue	AttributedRevenue	Number	FALSE	FALSE
Attributed Orders Placed	AttributedOrdersPlaced	Number	FALSE	FALSE
